attributes.title: Complete Garbage

attributes.review: This app gave my device 35 Different viruses and to make things worse it rapped my kids and killed my husband and force fed me his body while making my recently raped kids watch this has been a zero out of zero experience 😤

attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN! 🤢
attributes.review: who in the hell put the muffins in the freezer?! BUT THIS APP LAGS ME OUT! DOESN'T WORK FOR NOTHING! ITS GLITCHY AND VERY SLOW! I will never download this app ever in my life, worthless!

attributes.title: Didn’t work
attributes.review: For some reason this app didn’t work. Don’t waste your time.

attributes.title: Unbelievable
attributes.review: One of the worst apps I ever got! The app kept crashing over and over again and couldn’t even use it properly. Anyway the stuff on it was absolute garbage. It seems like the app is based around an ignorant self centered selfish child who we could do without. I uninstalled it immediately because it was basically trash on my phone. Would not recommend for anyone who has common sense.

attributes.title: IVE BEEN CURSED!!!
attributes.review:
SO I GOT THIS APP AND GUESS WHAT??? IT GAVE ME A CURSE 😱😱😱 believe me, i’m as shocked as you are 😖😩”HOW WOULD YOU KNOW??” you may ask. it’s just obvi durr 🙄 
(F)irst, it ca(U)sed me to make a spaghetti soup instead of an avocado 🤬 disgusting!!! right!!!?!?? i (C)an’t believe it made me do that 👺😔🤮 avocado soup 🤤😋> spaghetti soup 🤬😭
second, it caused my dog to start wa(K)ing on the ceiling!!!!!! (T)hen you may ask “oh but maybe you(R) dog just is magical!!!” in that case, NO SHE ISNT!!!! she is a perfectly normal dog beca(U)se i went to go get her checked out yesterday and the vets said she was 100% okay!!!! then you’ll probably say “(M)aybe she got it as soon as she exited the vet?” WHICH ISNT TRUE EITHER. if she acquired these (P)owers as soon as i exited the vet, she’d be WAY MORE EVOLVED NOW. plus she got them AS SOON AS I DOWNLOADED THIS APP!!!!
and finally third, this app gets this rating not only because of the curse it gave me, but because it caused me to write this super long passage on why you SHOULDNT SUPPORT IT OR GET IT!!!!
anyways gonna go make some avocado soup now 😋🥑
